text.value: CHW-L name:
Please only use letters to record your name
CHW-L ID:
CHW-L ID is a unique number and must be greater than 0
Today's date:
Supervised CHW's ID:
CHW ID is a unique number and must be greater than 0
Which community does this CHW serve? Community ID:
Community ID must be greater than 0
REMINDER: Please look out for expired medicines while conducting the CHW Restock
GRP-medicines
ACT 25mg
How many blister packets of ACT 25mg?
Restock the CHW with blister packets of ACT 25mg
Full - Restocked CHW with the correct amount
Partial - Gave CHW part of the amount
None - Did not restock any of the amount
How many blister packets of ACT 25mg did you provide?
Why was the proper amount not given to the CHW?

Not trained in module
